table.name: vtiger_employees
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_employees` ( `employeeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `employeeno` varchar(56) default NULL, `employeename` varchar(200) default NULL, `employeelastn` varchar(200) default NULL, `employeetitle` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_organization` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_department` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_officephone` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mobile` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_homephone` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_otherphone` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_fax` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_birthdate` date default NULL, `emp_email` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingstreet` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingpobox` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingcity` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingstate` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingpostalcode` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_mailingcountry` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_otherstreet` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_otherpobox` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_othercity` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_otherstate` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_otherpostalcode` varchar(200) default NULL, `emp_othercountry` varchar(200) default NULL, `firstdepartment` varchar(200) default NULL, `seconddepartment` varchar(200) default NULL, `datechangedep1` date default NULL, `datechangedep2` date default NULL, `thirddepartment` varchar(200) default NULL, `forthdepartment` varchar(200) default NULL, `datechangedep3` date default NULL, `datechangedep4` date default NULL, index (`employeename`), index (`employeelastn`), index (`employeeno`), PRIMARY KEY (`employeeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_employeescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_employeescf` ( `employeeid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`employeeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
